sentences.en: 'Carnage at Airport ', screamed the tabloid headline.
sentences.cn: 通俗小报的标题耸人听闻: “ 机场喋血”.

sentences.en: A strategist at a local trade association predicts that " 2011 - 12 will be carnage year. "
sentences.cn: 在当地行业协会的战略家预言道: “ 2011-12年度 将是的屠杀之年. ”

sentences.en: As a result, only the foolish or the daring rush in to add to carnage.
sentences.cn: 结果, 只有傻瓜和大胆的人冲进这场战争.

sentences.en: As a result, only the foolish or the daring rush in to add tothe carnage.
sentences.cn: 结果是, 只有愚蠢和胆大的人才会贸然去?

sentences.en: Dressed in nothing but her girdle she bears carnage in her soul.
sentences.cn: 浑身赤裸仅着腰带灵魂备受屠戮.

sentences.en: Far from the scenes of carnage, yacht companies are playing a role in fighting piracy.
sentences.cn: 虽然离劫掠屠杀的场景还很遥远, 游艇公司仍参与对抗海盗的行.

sentences.en: However, Shaughnessy says that carnage is not the point of his stories.
sentences.cn: 然而, 欧沙纳西说杀戮并非他作品的重点.

sentences.en: It's funny how some races see nearly everyone finishing, and others witness carnage.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是一些比赛几乎所有的人都完赛了, 而别的却是连环的退赛.

sentences.en: Kyruk stood atop the gate and surveyed the carnage below.
sentences.cn: 开鲁可站在城门上观察着脚下的战场.

sentences.en: The ancient Rome battlefield was a scene of great carnage.
sentences.cn: 古罗马战场曾尸横遍地.

sentences.en: The battlefield was a scene of great carnage.
Though poaching is still a problem, strict laws have reduced this senseless carnage.
sentences.cn: 虽然偷猎仍是个问题, 但严格的法律已使滥杀减少.

sentences.en: What place has art in the shadow of such indiscriminate carnage and suffering?
sentences.cn: 在如此肆意的屠杀和折磨的阴影中堪有一席之地?

sentences.en: When Bhaal held sway over my soul, I reveled in the bloody carnage I wrought.
sentences.cn: 当巴尔操控我的灵魂, 我着迷于我杀戮的鲜血.

sentences.en: Yet , amid all the carnage, questions remain about the seriousnessof the outbreak.
sentences.cn: 一片喊杀声中,针对疫情实际程度的疑问挥之不去.

trans.tran_en: when a lot of people are killed and injured, especially in a war
